review_title: For relaxation when you feel tense
review_text: I have had SIBO and irritable bowel syndrome for many years, and the main reason is that I am nervous and sensitive to stress, but I am not the type of person who can actively relieve stress, so I try to slowly improve the quality of my relaxation. I also take melatonin supplements to help me sleep, but I feel that taking them regularly is not good, so I am careful not to let my body get used to them by replacing them with other herbal ingredients like this one.

The quality is one of the best on the market, the ingredients did not raise any questions, the size of the product is convenient for storage, the packaging is high-quality, everything arrived intact, I did not notice any defects, the advantage, of course, is the price for such a product

review_title: When you want to relax a bit
review_text: I use this when I want to relax and "if only I could fall asleep a little easier." I sometimes feel a bit sluggish the next morning when I drink something with a high kava content, but this makes me feel refreshed when I wake up.

As an effect, Valerian → pain relief, sleep assistance blue sky cap → relaxation, panic relief → Anti-anxiety, improvement of sleep quality I used to take various sleep supplements in the past, but now I am supplementing them all with this one. Since the grains are not small, it may be difficult to get used to drinking, but considering that this supplement is enough, I think it is very good! Also, if you have troubles at work, etc. and are attacked by strong anxiety, you can calm down by taking this supplement, and you can relax and face the things in front of you. increase. In addition, taking this medicine makes it easier to fall asleep, and improving the quality of sleep improves the physical and mental condition and eventually solves the problem, so I cannot let go of it as a supporter of my own growth. I highly recommend it!

Many people are wary of taking kava because of its toxic effects on the liver. And it turned out that kava is really toxic, but firstly if it is not properly processed, and secondly if it is a slightly different kind of kava. But in any case, in order to minimize the risk, it is better not to take if: a) severe liver problems b) for a long time d) together with alcohol. And in all other respects, this is an excellent tool that helps not only with sleep, but also with anxiety. I tried to study all the information that I considered important, so if it turned out to be useful for you, put your finger up!
